title: 求解服务端崩溃！！！
author: C-TD
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

replies.txt_content:
Exception in server tick loop
实体错误导致空指针Exception in server tick loop
然而crash里并没有找到指定的区块
楼主可以查看log，看看是否有说明
